text: (Hoi Thien Su, Nguoi hay nho lai khi Allah phan bao dan Israel): “Cac nguoi hay vao thi tran (Jerusalem) nay, cac nguoi hay tu do an (thuc pham) bat cu noi nao cua thi tran tuy thich va cac nguoi hay cau nguyen (TA): ‘Xin Ngai tha thu toi loi cho bay toi’ va cac nguoi hay vao cong trong su phu phuc, TA se tha thu toi loi cho cac nguoi, va TA se ban them (phan thuong) cho nhung nguoi lam tot.”
